Now; why would Edwin conduct such an experiment?

Perhaps Edwin does it because he wants to experience the carefree life of a baby one more time?

Or, maybe it's because he wants to give Tommy a special gift, namely being an older child, for a few days?

1113.content: His change will have something to do with his...
1113.title: Something else

11132.content:
I don't know if anyone else has already thought of this: but what if after all these years Angelica's cold,mean-spirited influence has finally rubbed off on Tommy,changing him from a kind-hearted individual and natural born leader to becoming as mean as she is!

Sound like a good idea?
11132.title: Personality

111322.content: Great idea, but, let's see about some other options here. Tommy soon is influenced by...
111322.title: On second thought.....

1113223.content:
"I don't know about this Tommy,it looks awfully scary up there!" Chuckle,the two years old nervously whispered and he was also,one year old fearless Tommy Pickles' best friend as the two of them were exploring the eerie upstairs attic,as usual Tommy's curiosity got the better of him and he just had to escape from his playpen and drag his scaredy cat friend along with him.

"Nonsense Chuckie,I overheard my mommy and daddy saying this morning that they have some interesting things up there in the atty. It might be a entire mountain filled of toys or candy! Who knows what could be up there? Come on!" As slowly,they climbed the wooden steps as usual all the adults were in the living room,watching TV so the chances of the babies getting caught was very slim!

Finally the moment arrived when both managed to pull open the door to the attic and what a shock it was when the first thing that surprised both kids was how eerie the dark was!

"Tommy,this is very scary! It's too dark up here!" Chuckie whispered as he fumbled around,unable to see.

"No worries Chuckie! Luckily I managed to bring my Raptor night light with me!" As Tommy switched it on.

"There! Now we can see more clearer!" As the attic indeed did have quite a few interesting things from numerous clothes the Pickles wore to a huge old fashioned treasure chest that Tommy upon closer examination,knew had to contain a endless barrage of toys.

" Come on Chuckie! Help me get this chest open!" He ordered.

"Well...I don't know Tommy...." But Chuckie decided to give in and after a while,both managed to pry the heavy chest open but instead of a mountain of toys,there was one of Stu Pickles' creepy earliest inventions that ended up....
1113223.title: Anyone else.

11133.content: Say, here's an idea, what if an invention of his dad's accidentally turns him invisible?
11133.title: More.

choices: He waits and shows his friends the stuff
Take a few sips of it now
111331.content:
"Didi,Come in here! I've done it! I've finally done it!" Stu Pickles cried happily as he beckoned his former school teacher wife into his downstairs work area along with their one year old.

"Yawn...Stu...it's two in the morning! Did what already?" She asked groggy,rubbing her eyes.

"Finally created the perfect formula for getting out those rusty stains on the kitchen sink and around the bathtub! Goodbye store brought spray bottles and toilet cleaners!" As he held up a small bottle of what happened to be a blue like liquid.

"Ohhh..." Moaned the one year old in his mother's arms who thought this strange thing his dad was holding,was sone kind of new type of milk or juice.

"What is that Stu? Another one of your kooky inventions?"

"Kooky inventions? This little baby will change the way we humans spend all hours scrubbing away hard stains on the rug and icky rings around the bathtub Di!" Stu said annoyed.

"Ohh how so?" His wife asked.

"By practically making as if it wasn't even there! This special formula I spent all night creating and mixing in different ingredients for will practically make whatever I spray on,completely invisible Didi as if by magic! You know become something like a actual ghost and be able to move through walls and stuff? Don't believe me? Observe...." As Stu sprayed a ordinary screwdriver with the stuff and right before their eyes,it vanished in thin air!

"What th-Stu...H-How...." Didi was so shocked,she nearly dropped her infant who still looked both bewildered and awed by this purple 'milk' stuff!

"See? I told you! It worked! I already tested it out on a few other things! Yeah they're gone now and I really don't know how last the effects will last but I'm hoping to take this downtown tomorrow to those big wigs in City Hall so I can obtain a business contact so I can start selling this stuff as I already got a wild and crazy...."

"Stu,do you think this stuff's safe for the population? What if someone accidentally eats some or something happens?" Didi nervously asked.

"Nothing bad will happen dear. The worst is that they'll wind up invisible for a few minutes and return to normal...this stuff's 100% safe!"

As the two of them were still talking and planning on heading back upstairs,unknown to them,Tommy managed to get down on the floor and grabbed hold of the spray bottle while his dad wasn't looking and like most things,he hid it away in the depths of his diaper.

"Well come on sport,I'll get you to bed..wait where is it? I just put it here on the table...Ahhh well...I'll look for it tomorrow! Come on Di!" As they headed back upstairs and as they put him back into his crib,Tommy quickly brought out the strange purple milk stuff and opened the cap.

"Wonder why my daddy would make this funny type of milk for when we already have milk in the refrigerator? And why did he sound all excited by this stuff? Something about being like a ghost and able to move through walls? Sounds neat! Maybe I should take a taste of this....." The one year old thought.

But should he wait to show Chuckie and the others or simply try some right now?
111331.title: Yeah, sure.

choices: Chuckie or Kimi, or anyone else.
1113311.content: He soon was able to show it to his friends. Did Phil and Lil drink some first, though?
1113311.title: He waits and shows his friends the stuff

info.brief_description: The characters of Rugrats will transform.
info.description: Bringing this back, once again. Rules. No drugs, no sex. No insulting characters. No unborn or back to the womb. Nothing over the top. All transformations are allowed, save the one above.
